Repulsion Armor Plate.name: Repulsion Armor Plate
Repulsion Armor Plate.shortDescription: Receive flat damage reduction from all attacks.
Repulsion Armor Plate.description: Reduce all incoming damage by 5 (+5 per stack). Cannot be reduced below 1.

Mocha.name: Mocha
Mocha.shortDescription: Slightly increase attack speed and movement speed.
Mocha.description: Increases attack speed by 7.5% (+7.5 per stack) and movement speed by 7% (+7% per stack).

Topaz Brooch.name: Topaz Brooch
Topaz Brooch.shortDescription: Gain a temporary barrier on kill.
Topaz Brooch.description: Gain a temporary barrier on kill for 15 health (+15 per stack).

Tougher Times.name: Tougher Times
Tougher Times.description: 15% (+15% per stack) chance to block incoming damage. Unaffected by luck.

unlock.name: Learning Process
unlock.description: 15% (+15% per stack) chance to block incoming damage. Unaffected by luck.

Tri-Tip Dagger.name: Tri-Tip Dagger
Tri-Tip Dagger.shortDescription: Gain +10% chance to bleed enemies on hit.
Tri-Tip Dagger.description: 10% (+10% per stack) chance to bleed an enemy for 240% base damage.

Armor-Piercing Rounds.name: Armor-Piercing Rounds
Armor-Piercing Rounds.description: Deal an additional 20% damage (+20% per stack) to bosses.

unlock.name: Advancement
unlock.description: Deal an additional 20% damage (+20% per stack) to bosses.

Lens-Maker's Glasses.name: Lens-Maker's Glasses
Lens-Maker's Glasses.shortDescription: Gain 10% chance for hits to 'Critically Strike', dealing double damage.
Lens-Maker's Glasses.description: Your attacks have a 10% (+10% per stack) chance to 'Critically Strike', dealing double damage.

Crowbar.name: Crowbar
Crowbar.shortDescription: Deal bonus damage to enemies above 90% health.
Crowbar.description: Deal +75% (+75% per stack) damage to enemies above 90% health.

unlock.name: The Basics
unlock.description: Deal +75% (+75% per stack) damage to enemies above 90% health.

Warped Echo.name: Warped Echo
Warped Echo.description: On damage taken 50% of the damage is dealt immediately while the other 50% is delayed for 3 seconds. This effect has a cooldown of 10 seconds. Every additional item increases how many instances of this effect the player has.

Bundle of Fireworks.name: Bundle of Fireworks
Bundle of Fireworks.shortDescription: Activating an interactable launches fireworks at nearby enemies.
Bundle of Fireworks.description: Activating an interactable launches 8 (+4 per stack) fireworks that deal 300% base damage.

unlock.name: ...Maybe One More.
unlock.description: Activating an interactable launches 8 (+4 per stack) fireworks that deal 300% base damage.

Bison Steak.name: Bison Steak
Bison Steak.description: Increases maximum health by 25 (+25 per stack).

Delicate Watch.name: Delicate Watch
Delicate Watch.shortDescription: Deal bonus damage. Breaks at low health.
Delicate Watch.description: Increase damage by 20% (+20% per stack). Taking damage to below 25% health breaks this item.

Roll of Pennies.name: Roll of Pennies
Roll of Pennies.description: Gain 3 (+3 per stack) gold on taking damage from an enemy. Scales over time.

Cautious Slug.name: Cautious Slug
Cautious Slug.description: Increases base health regeneration by +3 hp/s (+3 hp/s per stack) while outside of combat.

Power Elixir.name: Power Elixir
Power Elixir.shortDescription: Receive an instant heal at low health. Consumed on use.
Power Elixir.description: Taking damage to below 25% health consumes this item, healing you for 75% of maximum health.

Paul's Goat Hoof.name: Paul's Goat Hoof
Paul's Goat Hoof.description: Increases movement speed by 14% (+14% per stack).

unlock.name: "Is This Bugged?"
unlock.description: Increases movement speed by 14% (+14% per stack).

Gasoline.name: Gasoline
Gasoline.shortDescription: Killing an enemy ignites other nearby enemies.
Gasoline.description: Killing an enemy ignites all enemies within 12m (+4m per stack) for 150% base damage. Additionally, enemies burn for 150% (+75% per stack) base damage.

Chronic Expansion.name: Chronic Expansion
Chronic Expansion.shortDescription: Gain Damage after killing enemies in quick succession.
Chronic Expansion.description: Every 5 enemies slain grants a damage counter bonus increasing the players damage by 10% (+5% per item stack), lasting as long as the player stays in combat.

Knockback Fin.name: Knockback Fin
Knockback Fin.shortDescription: On hit, enemies are knocked into the air.
Knockback Fin.description: 7.5% (+7.5% per stack) chance on hit to knock enemies into the air. (Height increases per stack).

Bolstering Lantern.name: Bolstering Lantern
Bolstering Lantern.shortDescription: Deal extra damage at lower health.
Bolstering Lantern.description: When below 50% health, receive a damage increase of 20% (+20% bonus damage per item stack).

Medkit.name: Medkit
Medkit.shortDescription: Receive a delayed heal after taking damage.
Medkit.description: 2 seconds after getting hurt, heal for 20 plus an additional 5% (+5% per stack) of maximum health.

unlock.name: Elite Slayer
unlock.description: 2 seconds after getting hurt, heal for 20 plus an additional 5% (+5% per stack) of maximum health.

Bustling Fungus.name: Bustling Fungus
Bustling Fungus.shortDescription: Heal all nearby allies after standing still for 1 second.
Bustling Fungus.description: After standing still for 1 second, create a zone that heals for 4.5% (+2.25% per stack) of your health every second to all allies within 3m (+1.5m per stack).

Focus Crystal.name: Focus Crystal
Focus Crystal.shortDescription: Deal bonus damage to nearby enemies.
Focus Crystal.description: Increase damage to enemies within 13m by 20% (+20% per stack).

Antler Shield.name: Antler Shield
Antler Shield.description: 55% (+5% per stack) chance on being hit to reflect 10% (+10% per stack) damage back to the attacker.

Oddly-shaped Opal.name: Oddly-shaped Opal
Oddly-shaped Opal.shortDescription: Reduce damage the first time you are hit.
Oddly-shaped Opal.description: Increase armor by 100 (+100 per stack) while out of danger.

Personal Shield Generator.name: Personal Shield Generator
Personal Shield Generator.description: Gain a shield equal to 8% (+8% per stack) of your maximum health. Recharges outside of danger.

Item Scrap, White.name: Item Scrap, White
Item Scrap, White.shortDescription: Does nothing. Prioritized when used with 3D Printers.
Item Scrap, White.description: Does nothing. Prioritized when used with 3D Printers.

Backup Magazine.name: Backup Magazine
Backup Magazine.shortDescription: Add an extra charge of your Secondary skill.
Backup Magazine.description: Add +1 (+1 per stack) charge of your Secondary skill.

unlock.name: Flawless
unlock.description: Add +1 (+1 per stack) charge of your Secondary skill.

Energy Drink.name: Energy Drink
Energy Drink.description: Sprint speed is improved by 25% (+25% per stack).

Sticky Bomb.name: Sticky Bomb
Sticky Bomb.shortDescription: Chance on hit to attach a bomb to enemies.
Sticky Bomb.description: 5% (+5% per stack) chance on hit to attach a bomb to an enemy, detonating for 180% TOTAL damage.

Stun Grenade.name: Stun Grenade
Stun Grenade.description: 5% (+5% on stack) chance on hit to stun enemies for 2 seconds.

Soldier's Syringe.name: Soldier's Syringe
Soldier's Syringe.description: Increases attack speed by 15% (+15% per stack).

Monster Tooth.name: Monster Tooth
Monster Tooth.shortDescription: Drop a healing orb on kill.
Monster Tooth.description: Killing an enemy spawns a healing orb that heals for 8 plus an additional 2% (+2% per stack) of maximum health.

Rusted Key.name: Rusted Key
Rusted Key.shortDescription: Gain access to a Rusty Lockbox that contains a powerful item.
Rusted Key.description: A hidden cache containing an item (80%/20%) will appear in a random location on each stage. Opening the cache consumes this item.

unlock.name: Keyed Up
unlock.description: A hidden cache containing an item (80%/20%) will appear in a random location on each stage. Opening the cache consumes this item.

Warbanner.name: Warbanner
Warbanner.shortDescription: Drop a Warbanner on level up or starting the Teleporter event. Grants allies attack and movement speed.
Warbanner.description: On level up or starting the Teleporter event, drop a banner that strengthens all allies within 16m (+8m per stack). Raise attack and movement speed by 30%.

Predatory Instincts.name: Predatory Instincts
Predatory Instincts.shortDescription: 'Critical Strikes' increase attack speed. Stacks 3 times.
Predatory Instincts.description: Gain 5% critical chance. Critical strikes increase attack speed by 12%. Maximum cap of 36% (+24% per stack) attack speed.

unlock.name: Rapidfire
unlock.description: Gain 5% critical chance. Critical strikes increase attack speed by 12%. Maximum cap of 36% (+24% per stack) attack speed.

Bandolier.name: Bandolier
Bandolier.shortDescription: Chance on kill to drop an ammo pack that resets all skill cooldowns.
Bandolier.description: 18% (+10% per stack) chance on kill to drop an ammo pack that resets all skill cooldowns.

Ghor's Tome.name: Ghor's Tome
Ghor's Tome.shortDescription: Chance on kill to drop a treasure.
Ghor's Tome.description: 4% (+4% on stack) chance on kill to drop a treasure worth $25. Scales over time.

Ukulele.name: Ukulele
Ukulele.description: 25% chance to fire chain lightning for 80% TOTAL damage on up to 3 (+2 per stack) targets within 20m (+2m per stack).

Death Mark.name: Death Mark
Death Mark.shortDescription: Enemies with 4 or more debuffs are marked for death, taking bonus damage.
Death Mark.description: Enemies with 4 or more debuffs are marked for death, increasing damage taken by 50% from all sources for 7 (+7 per stack) seconds.

War Horn.name: War Horn
War Horn.shortDescription: Activating your Equipment gives you a burst of attack speed.
War Horn.description: Activating your Equipment gives you +70% attack speed for 8s (+4s per stack).

unlock.name: Warmonger
unlock.description: Activating your Equipment gives you +70% attack speed for 8s (+4s per stack).

Fuel Cell.name: Fuel Cell
Fuel Cell.shortDescription: Hold an additional equipment charge. Reduce equipment cooldown.
Fuel Cell.description: Hold an additional equipment charge (+1 per stack). Reduce equipment cooldown by 15% (+15% per stack).

unlock.name: Experimenting
unlock.description: Hold an additional equipment charge (+1 per stack). Reduce equipment cooldown by 15% (+15% per stack).

Old Guillotine.name: Old Guillotine
Old Guillotine.shortDescription: Instantly kill low health Elite monsters.
Old Guillotine.description: Instantly kill Elite monsters below 13% (+13% per stack) health.

unlock.name: Cut Down
unlock.description: Instantly kill Elite monsters below 13% (+13% per stack) health.

Will-o'-the-wisp.name: Will-o'-the-wisp
Will-o'-the-wisp.description: On killing an enemy, spawn a lava pillar in a 12m (+2.4m per stack) radius for 350% (+280% per stack) base damage.

Chance Doll.name: Chance Doll
Chance Doll.shortDescription: Chance to increase item rarity at Shrines of Chance.
Chance Doll.description: 20% (+8% per stack) chance to get higher rarity items from chance shrines on success.

Prayer Beads.name: Prayer Beads
Prayer Beads.shortDescription: Item stores experience and gives stats on item removal.
Prayer Beads.description: Grows in power by absorbing experience, storing 20% (+5% per item stack) of player stats per item level up. On removal, gain all stored stats.

Hopoo Feather.name: Hopoo Feather
Hopoo Feather.description: Gain +1 (+1 per stack) maximum jump count.

Kjaro's Band.name: Kjaro's Band
Kjaro's Band.shortDescription: High damage hits also blasts enemies with a runic flame tornado. Recharges over time.
Kjaro's Band.description: Hits that deal more than 400% damage also blasts enemies with a runic flame tornado, dealing 300% (+300% per stack) TOTAL damage over time. Recharges every 10 seconds.

unlock.name: Death Do Us Part
unlock.description: Hits that deal more than 400% damage also blasts enemies with a runic flame tornado, dealing 300% (+300% per stack) TOTAL damage over time. Recharges every 10 seconds.

Shipping Request Form.name: Shipping Request Form
Shipping Request Form.shortDescription: Get a delivery each stage that contains powerful items.
Shipping Request Form.description: A delivery containing 2 items (79%/20%/1%) will appear in a random location on each stage. (Increases rarity chances of the items per stack).

Harvester's Scythe.name: Harvester's Scythe
Harvester's Scythe.description: Gain 5% critical chance. Critical strikes heal for 8 (+4 per stack) health.

unlock.name: Prismatically Aligned
unlock.description: Gain 5% critical chance. Critical strikes heal for 8 (+4 per stack) health.

Runald's Band.name: Runald's Band
Runald's Band.shortDescription: High damage hits also blasts enemies with runic ice. Recharges over time.
Runald's Band.description: Hits that deal more than 400% damage also blasts enemies with a runic ice blast, slowing them by 80% for 3s (+3s per stack) and dealing 250% (+250% per stack) TOTAL damage. Recharges every 10 seconds.

unlock.name: Death Do Us Part
unlock.description: Hits that deal more than 400% damage also blasts enemies with a runic ice blast, slowing them by 80% for 3s (+3s per stack) and dealing 250% (+250% per stack) TOTAL damage. Recharges every 10 seconds.

Luminous Shot.name: Luminous Shot
Luminous Shot.description: Using the secondary skill charges the next primary attack, dealing +150% damage (+25% per item stack) per charge to 5 times (+1 per item stack)

Infusion.name: Infusion
Infusion.shortDescription: Killing an enemy permanently increases your maximum health, up to 100.
Infusion.description: Killing an enemy increases your health permanently by 1 (+1 per stack), up to a maximum of 100 (+100 per stack) health.

unlock.name: Slaughter
unlock.description: Killing an enemy increases your health permanently by 1 (+1 per stack), up to a maximum of 100 (+100 per stack) health.

Wax Quail.name: Wax Quail
Wax Quail.shortDescription: Jumping while sprinting boosts you forward.
Wax Quail.description: Jumping while sprinting boosts you forward by 10m (+10m per stack).

unlock.name: Going Fast Recommended
unlock.description: Jumping while sprinting boosts you forward by 10m (+10m per stack).

Sale Star.name: Sale Star
Sale Star.shortDescription: First chest bought yields more than one reward. Usable once per stage.
Sale Star.description: Gain an extra item on the first chest opened per stage. Each additional Sale Star increases the chance of getting more items by 5%.

AtG Missile Mk. 1.name: AtG Missile Mk. 1
AtG Missile Mk. 1.description: 10% chance to fire a missile that deals 300% (+300% per stack) TOTAL damage.

Hunter's Harpoon.name: Hunter's Harpoon
Hunter's Harpoon.shortDescription: Killing an enemy gives you a burst of movement speed.
Hunter's Harpoon.description: Killing an enemy increases movement speed by 125%, fading over 1 (+0.5 per stack) seconds.

Old War Stealthkit.name: Old War Stealthkit
Old War Stealthkit.description: Falling below 25% health causes you to gain 40% movement speed and invisibility for 5s. Recharges every 30 seconds (-50% per stack).

Shuriken.name: Shuriken
Shuriken.shortDescription: Activating your Primary skill also throws a shuriken. Recharges over time.
Shuriken.description: Activating your Primary skill also throws a shuriken that deals 400% (+100% per stack) base damage. You can hold up to 3 (+1 per stack) shurikens which all reload over 10 seconds.

Regenerating Scrap.name: Regenerating Scrap
Regenerating Scrap.description: Does nothing. Prioritized when used with Uncommon 3D Printers. At the start of each stage, it regenerates.

Item Scrap, Green.name: Item Scrap, Green
Item Scrap, Green.shortDescription: Does nothing. Prioritized when used with 3D Printers.
Item Scrap, Green.description: Does nothing. Prioritized when used with 3D Printers.

Leeching Seed.name: Leeching Seed
Leeching Seed.description: Dealing damage heals you for 1 (+1 per stack) health.

Chronobauble.name: Chronobauble
Chronobauble.description: Slow enemies on hit for -60% movement speed for 2s (+2s per stack).

Rose Buckler.name: Rose Buckler
Rose Buckler.description: Increase armor by 30 (+30 per stack) while sprinting.

Red Whip.name: Red Whip
Red Whip.description: Leaving combat boosts your movement speed by 30% (+30% per stack).

Squid Polyp.name: Squid Polyp
Squid Polyp.shortDescription: Activating an interactable summons a Squid Turret nearby.
Squid Polyp.description: Activating an interactable summons a Squid Turret that attacks nearby enemies at 100% (+100% per stack) attack speed. Lasts 30 seconds.

unlock.name: Automation Activation
unlock.description: Activating an interactable summons a Squid Turret that attacks nearby enemies at 100% (+100% per stack) attack speed. Lasts 30 seconds.

Ignition Tank.name: Ignition Tank
Ignition Tank.shortDescription: Your ignite effects deal quadruple damage.
Ignition Tank.description: Ignite effects deal +300% (+300% per stack) more damage over time.

Lepton Daisy.name: Lepton Daisy
Lepton Daisy.shortDescription: Periodically release a healing nova during the Teleporter event and 'Holdout Zones' such as the Void Fields.
Lepton Daisy.description: Release a healing nova during the Teleporter event, healing all nearby allies for 50% of their maximum health. Occurs 1 (+1 per stack) times.

Unstable Transmitter.name: Unstable Transmitter
Unstable Transmitter.shortDescription: On low health, explode and teleport away a short distance.
Unstable Transmitter.description: When reaching below 25% health the Survivor explodes, dealing 350% (+350% per item stack) damage to nearby enemies and teleporting to a random location. This effect has a cooldown of 2 minutes (-5% per item stack).

Razorwire.name: Razorwire
Razorwire.shortDescription: Retaliate in a burst of razors on taking damage.
Razorwire.description: Getting hit causes you to explode in a burst of razors, dealing 160% damage. Hits up to 5 (+2 per stack) targets in a 25m (+10m per stack) radius

Noxious Thorn.name: Noxious Thorn
Noxious Thorn.shortDescription: When taking damage chance to trigger active enemy debuffs. Applies bleed.
Noxious Thorn.description: 25% chance on being hit to inflict nearby enemies with 2 (+1 per stack) Stacks of bleed. If enemies are already inflicted with one or more stackable debuffs, add 1 (+1 per stack) to those debuffs instead

Berzerker's Pauldron.name: Berzerker's Pauldron
Berzerker's Pauldron.shortDescription: Enter a frenzy after killing 4 enemies in quick succession.
Berzerker's Pauldron.description: Killing 4 enemies within 1 second sends you into a frenzy for 6s (+4s per stack). Increases movement speed by 50% and attack speed by 100%.

unlock.name: Glorious Battle
unlock.description: Killing 4 enemies within 1 second sends you into a frenzy for 6s (+4s per stack). Increases movement speed by 50% and attack speed by 100%.

Alien Head.name: Alien Head
Alien Head.description: Reduce skill cooldowns by 25% (+25% per stack).

Shattering Justice.name: Shattering Justice
Shattering Justice.shortDescription: Reduce the armor of enemies after repeatedly striking them.
Shattering Justice.description: After hitting an enemy 5 times, reduce their armor by 60 for 8 (+8 per stack) seconds.

Aegis.name: Aegis
Aegis.shortDescription: Healing past full grants you a temporary barrier.
Aegis.description: Healing past full grants you a temporary barrier for 50% (+50% per stack) of the amount you healed.

Brilliant Behemoth.name: Brilliant Behemoth
Brilliant Behemoth.description: All your attacks explode in a 4m (+2.5m per stack) radius for a bonus 60% TOTAL damage to nearby enemies.

Growth Nectar.name: Growth Nectar
Growth Nectar.shortDescription: Survivors with 5 or more buffs are marked for greatness.
Growth Nectar.description: While benefitting from 5+ unique buffs gain 20% (+20% per stack) bonus stats for 5 seconds.

Sentient Meat Hook.name: Sentient Meat Hook
Sentient Meat Hook.shortDescription: Chance to hook all nearby enemies.
Sentient Meat Hook.description: 20% (+20% per stack) chance on hit to fire homing hooks at up to 10 (+5 per stack) enemies for 100% TOTAL damage.

unlock.name: Deja Vu?
unlock.description: 20% (+20% per stack) chance on hit to fire homing hooks at up to 10 (+5 per stack) enemies for 100% TOTAL damage.

Defensive Microbots.name: Defensive Microbots
Defensive Microbots.shortDescription: Shoot down nearby projectiles. Recharge rate scales with attack speed.
Defensive Microbots.description: Shoot down 1 (+1 per stack) projectiles within 20m every 0.5 seconds. Recharge rate scales with attack speed.

57 Leaf Clover.name: 57 Leaf Clover
57 Leaf Clover.description: All random effects are rolled +1 (+1 per stack) times for a favorable outcome.

unlock.name: The Long Road
unlock.description: All random effects are rolled +1 (+1 per stack) times for a favorable outcome.

Laser Scope.name: Laser Scope
Laser Scope.shortDescription: Your 'Critical Strikes' deal an additional 100% damage.
Laser Scope.description: Critical Strikes deal an additional 100% damage (+100% per stack).

Ceremonial Dagger.name: Ceremonial Dagger
Ceremonial Dagger.shortDescription: Killing an enemy releases homing daggers.
Ceremonial Dagger.description: Killing an enemy fires out 3 homing daggers that deal 150% (+150% per stack) base damage.

Spare Drone Parts.name: Spare Drone Parts
Spare Drone Parts.shortDescription: Your drones fire faster, have less cooldowns, shoot missiles, and gain a bonus chaingun.
Spare Drone Parts.description: Gain Col. Droneman. Drones gain +50% (+50% per stack) attack speed and cooldown reduction. Drones gain 10% chance to fire a missile on hit, dealing 300% TOTAL damage. Drones gain an automatic chain gun that deals 6x100% damage, bouncing to 2 enemies.

Dio's Best Friend.name: Dio's Best Friend
Dio's Best Friend.description: Upon death, this item will be consumed and you will return to life with 3 seconds of invulnerability.

unlock.name: The Lone Survivor
unlock.description: Upon death, this item will be consumed and you will return to life with 3 seconds of invulnerability.

H3AD-5T v2.name: H3AD-5T v2
H3AD-5T v2.shortDescription: Increase jump height. Hold 'Interact' to slam down to the ground.
H3AD-5T v2.description: Increase jump height. Creates a 5m-100m radius kinetic explosion on hitting the ground, dealing 1000%-10000% base damage that scales up with fall distance. Recharges in 10 (-50% per stack) seconds.

Happiest Mask.name: Happiest Mask
Happiest Mask.shortDescription: Chance on killing an enemy to summon a ghost.
Happiest Mask.description: Killing enemies has a 7% chance to spawn a ghost of the killed enemy with 1500% damage. Lasts 30s (+30s per stack).

War Bonds.name: War Bonds
War Bonds.description: Yields 75 gold (+25 gold per item stack) based on current difficulty level and the survivor's level at the start of every stage.

Wake of Vultures.name: Wake of Vultures
Wake of Vultures.shortDescription: Temporarily steal the power of slain elites.
Wake of Vultures.description: Gain the power of any killed elite monster for 8s (+5s per stack).

Frost Relic.name: Frost Relic
Frost Relic.shortDescription: Killing enemies surrounds you with an ice storm.
Frost Relic.description: Killing an enemy surrounds you with an ice storm that deals 1200% damage per second and slows enemies by 80% for 1.5s. The storm grows with every kill, increasing its radius by 2m. Stacks up to 18m (+12m per stack).

Ben's Raincoat.name: Ben's Raincoat
Ben's Raincoat.shortDescription: Prevent debuffs, instead gaining a temporary barrier. Recharges over time.
Ben's Raincoat.description: Prevents 1 (+1 per stack) debuff and instead grants a temporary barrier for 10% of maximum health. Recharges every 5 seconds.

unlock.name: Naturopath
unlock.description: Heal +100% (+100% per stack) more.

Brainstalks.name: Brainstalks
Brainstalks.shortDescription: Skills have NO cooldowns for a short period after killing an elite.
Brainstalks.description: Upon killing an elite monster, enter a frenzy for 4s (+4s per stack) where skills have 0.5s cooldowns.

unlock.name: Deicide
unlock.description: Upon killing an elite monster, enter a frenzy for 4s (+4s per stack) where skills have 0.5s cooldowns.

Resonance Disc.name: Resonance Disc
Resonance Disc.shortDescription: Obtain a Resonance Disc charged by killing enemies. Fires automatically when fully charged.
Resonance Disc.description: Killing 4 enemies in 7 seconds charges the Resonance Disc. The disc launches itself toward a target for 300% base damage (+300% per stack), piercing all enemies it doesn't kill, and then explodes for 1000% base damage (+1000% per stack). Returns to the user, striking all enemies along the way for 300% base damage (+300% per stack).

Runic Lens.name: Runic Lens
Runic Lens.shortDescription: On high damage dealt increase the chance for a meteor attack.
Runic Lens.description: Overspill. 5% chance (+1% per 100% done on initial hit plus 1% per item stack) on hit to summon a meteor on the target, dealing 2000% damage (+50% damage per 100% damage done on initial hit plus +50% damage per item stack).

Pocket I.C.B.M..name: Pocket I.C.B.M.
Pocket I.C.B.M..shortDescription: All Missile items deal more damage and fire an additional two missiles.
Pocket I.C.B.M..description: All missile items and equipment fire an additional 2 missiles. Increase missile damage by 0% (+50% per stack)

N'kuhana's Opinion.name: N'kuhana's Opinion
N'kuhana's Opinion.description: Store 100% (+100% per stack) of healing as Soul Energy. After your Soul Energy reaches 10% of your maximum health, fire a skull that deals 250% of your Soul Energy as damage.

unlock.name: Her Concepts
unlock.description: Store 100% (+100% per stack) of healing as Soul Energy. After your Soul Energy reaches 10% of your maximum health, fire a skull that deals 250% of your Soul Energy as damage.

Symbiotic Scorpion.name: Symbiotic Scorpion
Symbiotic Scorpion.description: 100% chance on hit to reduce armor by 2 (+2 per stack) permanently.

Interstellar Desk Plant.name: Interstellar Desk Plant
Interstellar Desk Plant.shortDescription: Plant a healing fruit on kill.
Interstellar Desk Plant.description: On kill, plant a healing fruit seed that grows into a plant after 5 seconds.The plant heals for 5% of maximum health every 0.5 second to all allies within 10m (+5.0m per stack). Lasts 10 seconds.

Bottled Chaos.name: Bottled Chaos
Bottled Chaos.shortDescription: Activating your Equipment triggers an additional, random Equipment effect.
Bottled Chaos.description: Trigger a random equipment effect 1 (+1 per stack) time(s).

Sonorous Whispers.name: Sonorous Whispers
Sonorous Whispers.shortDescription: Upon large or elite monster kill chance to drop items.
Sonorous Whispers.description: When a large monster is killed it will always drop an item. All elites have a 4% chance of dropping an item (+1% per item stack).

Item Scrap, Red.name: Item Scrap, Red
Item Scrap, Red.shortDescription: Does nothing. Prioritized when used with 3D Printers.
Item Scrap, Red.description: Does nothing. Prioritized when used with 3D Printers.

Unstable Tesla Coil.name: Unstable Tesla Coil
Unstable Tesla Coil.shortDescription: Shock all nearby enemies every 10 seconds.
Unstable Tesla Coil.description: Fire out lightning that hits 3 (+2 per stack) enemies for 200% base damage every 0.5s. The Tesla Coil switches off every 10 seconds.

unlock.name: Macho
unlock.description: Fire out lightning that hits 3 (+2 per stack) enemies for 200% base damage every 0.5s. The Tesla Coil switches off every 10 seconds.

Electric Boomerang.name: Electric Boomerang
Electric Boomerang.shortDescription: On hit chance to throw a stunning boomerang.
Electric Boomerang.description: 15% chance on hit to fire an electric boomerang that travels a short distance before returning, dealing 30% (+30% per stack) damage and stunning all enemies hit.

Soulbound Catalyst.name: Soulbound Catalyst
Soulbound Catalyst.description: Kills reduce equipment cooldown by 4s (+2s per stack).

unlock.name: Newtist
unlock.description: Kills reduce equipment cooldown by 4s (+2s per stack).

Hardlight Afterburner.name: Hardlight Afterburner
Hardlight Afterburner.shortDescription: Add 2 extra charges of your Utility skill. Reduce Utility skill cooldown.
Hardlight Afterburner.description: Add +2 (+2 per stack) charges of your Utility skill. Reduces Utility skill cooldown by 33%.

Artifact Key.name: Artifact Key
Artifact Key.shortDescription: A stone shard with immense power.
Artifact Key.description: A stone shard with immense power.

Queen's Gland.name: Queen's Gland
Queen's Gland.description: Every 30 seconds, summon a Beetle Guard with bonus 300% damage and 100% health. Can have up to 1 (+1 per stack) Guards at a time.

Shatterspleen.name: Shatterspleen
Shatterspleen.shortDescription: Critical strikes always bleed enemies. Bleeding enemies now explode.
Shatterspleen.description: Gain 5% critical chance. Critical Strikes bleed enemies for 240% base damage. Bleeding enemies explode on death for 400% (+400% per stack) damage, plus an additional 15% (+15% per stack) of their maximum health.

Molten Perforator.name: Molten Perforator
Molten Perforator.shortDescription: Chance on hit to fire magma balls.
Molten Perforator.description: 10% chance on hit to call forth 3 magma balls from an enemy, dealing 300% (+300% per stack) damage each.

Titanic Knurl.name: Titanic Knurl
Titanic Knurl.description: Increase maximum health by 40 (+40 per stack) and base health regeneration by +1.6 hp/s (+1.6 hp/s per stack).

Charged Perforator.name: Charged Perforator
Charged Perforator.shortDescription: Chance on hit to call down a lightning strike.
Charged Perforator.description: 10% chance on hit to down a lightning strike, dealing 500% (+500% per stack) damage.

Defense Nucleus.name: Defense Nucleus
Defense Nucleus.shortDescription: Summon an Alpha Construct on killing an elite.
Defense Nucleus.description: Killing elite monsters spawns an Alpha Construct with bonus 300% damage and 300% health. Limited to 4 (+4 per stack).

Genesis Loop.name: Genesis Loop
Genesis Loop.shortDescription: Fire an electric nova at low health.
Genesis Loop.description: Falling below 25% health causes you to explode, dealing 6000% base damage. Recharges every 30 / (2 +1 per stack) seconds .

Planula.name: Planula
Planula.description: Heal from incoming damage for 15 (+15 per stack).

Pearl.name: Pearl
Pearl.description: Increases maximum health by 10% (+10% per stack).

Empathy Cores.name: Empathy Cores
Empathy Cores.shortDescription: Recruit a pair of Solus Probes that gain power with more allies.
Empathy Cores.description: Every 30 seconds, summon two Solus Probes that gain +100% (+100% per stack) damage per ally on your team.

Item Scrap, Yellow.name: Item Scrap, Yellow
Item Scrap, Yellow.shortDescription: Does nothing. Prioritized when used with 3D Printers.
Item Scrap, Yellow.description: Does nothing. Prioritized when used with 3D Printers.

Irradiant Pearl.name: Irradiant Pearl
Irradiant Pearl.description: Increases ALL stats by 10% (+10% per stack).

Mired Urn.name: Mired Urn
Mired Urn.shortDescription: Siphon health from nearby enemies while in combat.
Mired Urn.description: While in combat, the nearest 1 (+1 per stack) enemies to you within 13m will be 'tethered' to you, dealing 100% damage per second, applying tar, and healing you for 100% of the damage dealt.

Little Disciple.name: Little Disciple
Little Disciple.description: Fire a tracking wisp for 300% (+300% per stack) damage. Fires every 1.6 seconds while sprinting. Fire rate increases with movement speed.

Halcyon Seed.name: Halcyon Seed
Halcyon Seed.shortDescription: Summon Aurelionite during the Teleporter event.
Halcyon Seed.description: Summon Aurelionite during the teleporter event. It has 100% (+50% per stack) damage and 100% (+100% per stack) health.

Safer Spaces.name: Safer Spaces
Safer Spaces.shortDescription: Block the next source of damage.
Safer Spaces.description: Blocks incoming damage once. Recharges after 15 seconds (-10% per stack) Corrupts all Tougher Times.

Needletick.name: Needletick
Needletick.shortDescription: Chance to collapse enemies on hit.
Needletick.description: 10% (+10% per stack) chance to collapse an enemy for 400% base damage. Corrupts all Tri-Tip Daggers.

Lost Seer's Lenses.name: Lost Seer's Lenses
Lost Seer's Lenses.shortDescription: Gain a 0.5% chance to instantly kill a non-boss enemy.
Lost Seer's Lenses.description: Your attacks have a 0.5% (+0.5% per stack) chance to instantly kill a non-Boss enemy. Corrupts all Lens-Maker's Glasses.

Weeping Fungus.name: Weeping Fungus
Weeping Fungus.description: Heals for 2% (+2% per stack) of your health every second while sprinting. Corrupts all Bustling Fungi.

Encrusted Key.name: Encrusted Key
Encrusted Key.shortDescription: Gain access to an Encrusted Cache that contains a void item.
Encrusted Key.description: A hidden cache containing an item (60%/30%/10%) will appear in a random location on each stage. Opening the cache consumes this item. Corrupts all Rusted Keys.

Polylute.name: Polylute
Polylute.shortDescription: Chance to repeatedly strike a single enemy with lightning.
Polylute.description: 25% chance to fire lightning for 60% TOTAL damage up to 3 (+3 per stack) times. Corrupts all Ukuleles.

Singularity Band.name: Singularity Band
Singularity Band.shortDescription: High damage hits also create unstable black holes. Recharges over time.
Singularity Band.description: Hits that deal more than 400% damage also fire a black hole that draws enemies within 15m into its center. Lasts 5 seconds before collapsing, dealing 100% (+100% per stack) TOTAL damage. Recharges every 20 seconds. Corrupts all Runald's and Kjaro's Bands.

Lysate Cell.name: Lysate Cell
Lysate Cell.shortDescription: Add an extra charge of your Special skill.
Lysate Cell.description: Add +1 (+1 per stack) charge of your Special skill. Reduces Special skill cooldown by 33%. Corrupts all Fuel Cells.

Voidsent Flame.name: Voidsent Flame
Voidsent Flame.shortDescription: Full health enemies also detonate on hit.
Voidsent Flame.description: Upon hitting an enemy at full health, spawn a lava pillar in a 12m (+2.4m per stack) radius for 260% (+156% per stack) base damage. Corrupts all Will-o'-the-wisps.

Plasma Shrimp.name: Plasma Shrimp
Plasma Shrimp.shortDescription: While you have shield, fire missiles on every hit.
Plasma Shrimp.description: Gain a shield equal to 10% of your maximum health. While you have a shield, hitting an enemy fires a missile that deals 40% (+40% per stack) TOTAL damage. Corrupts all AtG Missile Mk. 1s.

Tentabauble.name: Tentabauble
Tentabauble.shortDescription: Chance to root enemies on hit.
Tentabauble.description: 5% (+5% per stack) chance on hit to root enemies for 1s (+1s per stack). Corrupts all Chronobaubles.

Benthic Bloom.name: Benthic Bloom
Benthic Bloom.shortDescription: Upgrades your items at the start of each stage.
Benthic Bloom.description: Upgrades 3 (+3 per stack) random items to items of the next higher rarity at the start of each stage. Corrupts all 57 Leaf Clovers.

Pluripotent Larva.name: Pluripotent Larva
Pluripotent Larva.description: Upon death, this item will be consumed and you will return to life with 3 seconds of invulnerability, and all of your items that can be corrupted will be. Corrupts all Dio's Best Friends.

Newly Hatched Zoea.name: Newly Hatched Zoea
Newly Hatched Zoea.description: Every 60 (-50% per stack) seconds, gain a random Void ally. Can have up to 1 (+1 per stack) allies at a time. Corrupts all yellow items.

Gesture of the Drowned.name: Gesture of the Drowned
Gesture of the Drowned.description: Reduce Equipment cooldown by 50% (+15% per stack). Forces your Equipment to activate whenever it is off cooldown.

unlock.name: The Demons And The Crabs
unlock.description: Reduce Equipment cooldown by 50% (+15% per stack). Forces your Equipment to activate whenever it is off cooldown.

Focused Convergence.name: Focused Convergence
Focused Convergence.shortDescription: Increase the speed of Teleporter charging...
Focused Convergence.description: Teleporters charge 30% (+30% per stack) faster, but the size of the Teleporter zone is 50% (-50% per stack) smaller.

unlock.name: Never Back Down
unlock.description: Teleporters charge 30% (+30% per stack) faster, but the size of the Teleporter zone is 50% (-50% per stack) smaller.

Brittle Crown.name: Brittle Crown
Brittle Crown.description: 30% chance on hit to gain 2 (+2 per stack) gold. Scales over time.Lose gold on taking damage equal to 100% (+100% per stack) of the maximum health percentage you lost.

Light Flux Pauldron.name: Light Flux Pauldron
Light Flux Pauldron.description: Decrease skill cooldowns by 50% (+50% per stack). Decrease attack speed by 50% (+50% per stack).

Stone Flux Pauldron.name: Stone Flux Pauldron
Stone Flux Pauldron.description: Increase max health by 100% (+100% per stack). Reduce movement speed by 50% (+50% per stack).

Purity.name: Purity
Purity.shortDescription: Reduce your skill cooldowns by 2 seconds.
Purity.description: All skill cooldowns are reduced by 2 (+1 per stack) seconds. All random effects are rolled +1 (+1 per stack) times for an unfavorable outcome.

unlock.name: The Calm
unlock.description: All skill cooldowns are reduced by 2 (+1 per stack) seconds. All random effects are rolled +1 (+1 per stack) times for an unfavorable outcome.

Shaped Glass.name: Shaped Glass
Shaped Glass.description: Increase base damage by 100% (+100% per stack). Reduce maximum health by 50% (+50% per stack).

Visions of Heresy.name: Visions of Heresy
Visions of Heresy.shortDescription: Replace your Primary Skill with 'Hungering Gaze'.
Visions of Heresy.description: Replace your Primary Skill with Hungering Gaze.Fire a flurry of tracking shards that detonate after a delay, dealing 120% base damage. Hold up to 12 charges (+12 per stack) that reload after 2 seconds (+2 per stack).

unlock.name: Blockade Breaker
unlock.description: Replace your Primary Skill with Hungering Gaze.Fire a flurry of tracking shards that detonate after a delay, dealing 120% base damage. Hold up to 12 charges (+12 per stack) that reload after 2 seconds (+2 per stack).

Hooks of Heresy.name: Hooks of Heresy
Hooks of Heresy.shortDescription: Replace your Secondary Skill with 'Slicing Maelstrom'.
Hooks of Heresy.description: Replace your Secondary Skill  with Slicing Maelstrom.Charge up a projectile that deals 875% damage per second to nearby enemies, exploding after 3 seconds to deal 700% damage and root enemies for 3 (+3 per stack) seconds. Recharges after 5 (+5 per stack) seconds.

unlock.name: Blockade Breaker
unlock.description: Replace your Secondary Skill  with Slicing Maelstrom.Charge up a projectile that deals 875% damage per second to nearby enemies, exploding after 3 seconds to deal 700% damage and root enemies for 3 (+3 per stack) seconds. Recharges after 5 (+5 per stack) seconds.

Essence of Heresy.name: Essence of Heresy
Essence of Heresy.description: Replace your Special Skill with Ruin.Dealing damage adds a stack of Ruin for 10 (+10 per stack) seconds. Activating the skill detonates all Ruin stacks at unlimited range, dealing 300% damage plus 120% damage per stack of Ruin. Recharges after 8 (+8 per stack) seconds.

unlock.name: Blockade Breaker
unlock.description: Replace your Special Skill with Ruin.Dealing damage adds a stack of Ruin for 10 (+10 per stack) seconds. Activating the skill detonates all Ruin stacks at unlimited range, dealing 300% damage plus 120% damage per stack of Ruin. Recharges after 8 (+8 per stack) seconds.

Egocentrism.name: Egocentrism
Egocentrism.description: Every 3 (-50% per stack) seconds, gain an orbiting bomb that detonates on impact for 360% damage, up to a maximum of 3 bombs (+1 per stack). Every 60 seconds, a random item is converted into this item.

Strides of Heresy.name: Strides of Heresy
Strides of Heresy.description: Replace your Utility Skill with Shadowfade.Fade away, becoming intangible and gaining +30% movement speed. Heal for 18.2% (+18.2% per stack) of your maximum health. Lasts 3 (+3 per stack) seconds.

unlock.name: Blockade Breaker
unlock.description: Replace your Utility Skill with Shadowfade.Fade away, becoming intangible and gaining +30% movement speed. Heal for 18.2% (+18.2% per stack) of your maximum health. Lasts 3 (+3 per stack) seconds.

Defiant Gouge.name: Defiant Gouge
Defiant Gouge.shortDescription: Using a Shrine summons enemies nearby.
Defiant Gouge.description: Using a Shrine summons enemies (stronger per stack) nearby. Scales over time.

Longstanding Solitude.name: Longstanding Solitude
Longstanding Solitude.description: On level up gain a free unlock for the next purchase (+1 free unlock per item stack) but all gold is converted to experience. Anything that costs gold is increased by 100% (+100% per item stack)

Mercurial Rachis.name: Mercurial Rachis
Mercurial Rachis.shortDescription: Randomly create a Ward of Power. ALL characters deal bonus damage while in the Ward.
Mercurial Rachis.description: Creates a Ward of Power in a random location nearby that buffs both enemies and allies within 16m (+50% per stack), causing them to deal +50% damage.

Eulogy Zero.name: Eulogy Zero
Eulogy Zero.shortDescription: Items and equipment have a small chance to transform into a Lunar item instead.
Eulogy Zero.description: Items have a 5% (+5% per stack) chance to become a Lunar item instead.

Corpsebloom.name: Corpsebloom
Corpsebloom.description: Heal +100% (+100% per stack) more. All healing is applied over time. Can heal for a maximum of 10% (-50% per stack) of your health per second.

Transcendence.name: Transcendence
Transcendence.shortDescription: Convert all your health into shield. Increase maximum health.
Transcendence.description: Convert all but 1 health into regenerating shields. Gain 50% (+25% per stack) maximum health.

Helfire Tincture.name: Helfire Tincture
Helfire Tincture.description: Ignite ALL characters within 15m for 12s. Deal 5% of your maximum health/second as burning as damage. The burn is 0.5x stronger on yourself, 0.25x stronger on allies, and 24x stronger on enemies.

unlock.name: Multikill!
unlock.description: Ignite ALL characters within 15m for 12s. Deal 5% of your maximum health/second as burning as damage. The burn is 0.5x stronger on yourself, 0.25x stronger on allies, and 24x stronger on enemies.

Effigy of Grief.name: Effigy of Grief
Effigy of Grief.shortDescription: Drop a permanent effigy that cripples ALL characters inside. Can place up to 5.
Effigy of Grief.description: ALL characters within are slowed by 50% and have their armor reduced by 20. Can place up to 5.

Glowing Meteorite.name: Glowing Meteorite
Glowing Meteorite.description: Rain meteors from the sky, damaging ALL characters for 600% damage per blast. Lasts 20 seconds.

unlock.name: Moon Worshipper
unlock.description: Rain meteors from the sky, damaging ALL characters for 600% damage per blast. Lasts 20 seconds.

Spinel Tonic.name: Spinel Tonic
Spinel Tonic.shortDescription: Gain a massive boost to ALL stats.
Spinel Tonic.description: Drink the Tonic, gaining a boost for 20 seconds. Increases damage by +100%. Increases attack speed by +70%. Increases armor by +20. Increases maximum health by +50%. Increases passive health regeneration by +300%. Increases movespeed by +30%.When the Tonic wears off, you have a 20% chance to gain a Tonic Affliction, reducing all of your stats by -5% (-5% per stack).

unlock.name: Cosmic Explorer
unlock.description: Drink the Tonic, gaining a boost for 20 seconds. Increases damage by +100%. Increases attack speed by +70%. Increases armor by +20. Increases maximum health by +50%. Increases passive health regeneration by +300%. Increases movespeed by +30%.When the Tonic wears off, you have a 20% chance to gain a Tonic Affliction, reducing all of your stats by -5% (-5% per stack).

Preon Accumulator.name: Preon Accumulator
Preon Accumulator.shortDescription: Fire a ball of energy that electrocutes nearby enemies before detonating.
Preon Accumulator.description: Fires preon tendrils, zapping enemies within 35m for up to 600% damage/second. On contact, detonate in an enormous 20m explosion for 4000% damage.

unlock.name: [REDACTED]
unlock.description: Fires preon tendrils, zapping enemies within 35m for up to 600% damage/second. On contact, detonate in an enormous 20m explosion for 4000% damage.

Primordial Cube.name: Primordial Cube
Primordial Cube.shortDescription: Fire a black hole that draws enemies in.
Primordial Cube.description: Fire a black hole that draws enemies within 30m into its center. Lasts 10 seconds

Trophy Hunter's Tricorn.name: Trophy Hunter's Tricorn
Trophy Hunter's Tricorn.shortDescription: Execute a large monster and claim its
Trophy Hunter's Tricorn.description: Execute any enemy capable of spawning a unique reward, and it will drop that item. Equipment is consumed on use.

Blast Shower.name: Blast Shower
Blast Shower.description: Cleanse all negative effects. Includes debuffs, damage over time, and nearby projectiles.

unlock.name: Warm For Life
unlock.description: Cleanse all negative effects. Includes debuffs, damage over time, and nearby projectiles.

Disposable Missile Launcher.name: Disposable Missile Launcher
Disposable Missile Launcher.description: Fire a swarm of 12 missiles that deal 12x300% damage.

Ocular HUD.name: Ocular HUD
Ocular HUD.shortDescription: Gain 100% Critical Strike Chance for 8 seconds.
Ocular HUD.description: Gain +100% Critical Strike Chance for 8 seconds.

Forgive Me Please.name: Forgive Me Please
Forgive Me Please.shortDescription: Throw a cursed doll that repeatedly triggers your 'On Kill' effects.
Forgive Me Please.description: Throw a cursed doll out that triggers any On-Kill effects you have every 1 second for 8 seconds.

unlock.name: I Love Dying!
unlock.description: Throw a cursed doll out that triggers any On-Kill effects you have every 1 second for 8 seconds.

The Back-up.name: The Back-up
The Back-up.shortDescription: Call drones for back up. Lasts 25 seconds.
The Back-up.description: Call 4 Strike Drones to fight for you. Lasts 25 seconds.

unlock.name: Mechanic
unlock.description: Call 4 Strike Drones to fight for you. Lasts 25 seconds.

Volcanic Egg.name: Volcanic Egg
Volcanic Egg.shortDescription: Transform into a speeding draconic fireball, dealing damage as you pass through enemies.
Volcanic Egg.description: Turn into a draconic fireball for 5 seconds. Deal 500% damage on impact. Detonates at the end for 800% damage.

Foreign Fruit.name: Foreign Fruit
Foreign Fruit.description: Instantly heal for 50% of your maximum health.

Eccentric Vase.name: Eccentric Vase
Eccentric Vase.shortDescription: Create a quantum tunnel between two locations.
Eccentric Vase.description: Create a quantum tunnel of up to 1000m in length. Lasts 30 seconds.

unlock.name: Blackout
unlock.description: Create a quantum tunnel of up to 1000m in length. Lasts 30 seconds.

The Crowdfunder.name: The Crowdfunder
The Crowdfunder.shortDescription: Toggle to fire. Costs gold per bullet.
The Crowdfunder.description: Fires a continuous barrage that deals 100% damage per bullet. Costs $1 per bullet. Cost increases over time.

unlock.name: Funded!
unlock.description: Fires a continuous barrage that deals 100% damage per bullet. Costs $1 per bullet. Cost increases over time.

Goobo Jr..name: Goobo Jr.
Goobo Jr..shortDescription: Create a clone of you for 30 seconds.
Goobo Jr..description: Spawn a gummy clone that has 300% damage and 300% health. Expires in 30 seconds.

Seed of Life.name: Seed of Life
Seed of Life.shortDescription: Revives the user when killed or dead allies on activation. Consumed on use.
Seed of Life.description: Revives the user when killed or dead allies on activation. Consumed on use.

Milky Chrysalis.name: Milky Chrysalis
Milky Chrysalis.description: Sprout wings and fly for 15 seconds. Gain +20% movement speed for the duration.

Super Massive Leech.name: Super Massive Leech
Super Massive Leech.shortDescription: Heal for a percentage of the damage you deal for 8 seconds.
Super Massive Leech.description: Heal for 20% of the damage you deal. Lasts 8 seconds.

Royal Capacitor.name: Royal Capacitor
Royal Capacitor.shortDescription: Call down a lightning strike on a targeted monster.
Royal Capacitor.description: Call down a lightning strike on a targeted monster, dealing 3000% damage and stunning nearby monsters.

unlock.name: Ascendant
unlock.description: Call down a lightning strike on a targeted monster, dealing 3000% damage and stunning nearby monsters.

Molotov (6-Pack).name: Molotov (6-Pack)
Molotov (6-Pack).shortDescription: Throw 6 flaming molotovs that ignite enemies upon shattering.
Molotov (6-Pack).description: Throw 6 molotov cocktails that ignites enemies for 500% base damage. Each molotov leaves a burning area for 200% damage per second.

Executive Card.name: Executive Card
Executive Card.shortDescription: Gain 10% cash back on all purchases. Multishops remain open.
Executive Card.description: Whenever you make a gold purchase, get 10% of the spent gold back. If the purchase is a multishop terminal, the other terminals will remain open.

Gnarled Woodsprite.name: Gnarled Woodsprite
Gnarled Woodsprite.shortDescription: Heal over time. Activate to send to an ally.
Gnarled Woodsprite.description: Gain a Woodsprite follower that heals for 1.5% of your maximum health/second. Can be sent to an ally to heal them for 10% of their maximum health.

unlock.name: One with the Woods
unlock.description: Gain a Woodsprite follower that heals for 1.5% of your maximum health/second. Can be sent to an ally to heal them for 10% of their maximum health.

Recycler.name: Recycler
Recycler.shortDescription: Transform an Item or Equipment into a different one. Can only recycle once.
Recycler.description: Transform an Item or Equipment into a different one. Can only be converted into the same tier one time.

unlock.name: Cleanup Duty
unlock.description: Transform an Item or Equipment into a different one. Can only be converted into the same tier one time.

Sawmerang.name: Sawmerang
Sawmerang.shortDescription: Throw a fan of buzzing saws that come back to you.
Sawmerang.description: Throw three large saw blades that slice through enemies for 3x400% damage. Also deals an additional 3x100% damage per second while bleeding enemies. Can strike enemies again on the way back.

Radar Scanner.name: Radar Scanner
Radar Scanner.description: Reveal all interactables within 500m for 10 seconds.

unlock.name: Bookworm
unlock.description: Reveal all interactables within 500m for 10 seconds.

Gorag's Opus.name: Gorag's Opus
Gorag's Opus.shortDescription: You and all your allies enter a frenzy.
Gorag's Opus.description: All allies enter a frenzy for 7 seconds. Increases movement speed by 50% and attack speed by 100%.

Remote Caffeinator.name: Remote Caffeinator
Remote Caffeinator.description: Request an Eclipse Zero Vending Machine from the UES Safe Travels. Delivery guaranteed in 5 seconds, dealing 2000% damage. Heal up to 3 targets for 25% of their maximum health.

Fuel Array.name: Fuel Array
Fuel Array.shortDescription: Looks like it could power something.
Fuel Array.description: Looks like it could power something. EXTREMELY unstable...
